title: Master’s Course in Game-Based Mathematics Learning Design: Strengthening Practical Competencies in Business Strategy

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners can design three or more educational mini-games that integrate mathematical principles with gamification
Learners can present specific learning objective-game mechanism linkage strategies through game design documents (Game Design Document/Storyboard)
Learners can analyze the educational effectiveness of game prototypes through peer evaluation
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
